getRecoveryStatus() - Method in class com.persistit.Management.JournalInfo
Return one of the following values:

Long.MINVALUE if recovery has not begun yet -1 if recovery ended after a "dirty" (abruptly terminated) shutdown 0 if recovery completed after a "clean" (normal) shutdown N > 0 if recovery is in progress, in which case N represents the approximate number of remaining bytes of journal data to process.
